channel.title: Couple questions
channel.description:
how do I boost the stats of a item ? (answered) how do I make my own custom commands? (unanswered) how do I make it so a couple items come when I type in a command? (answered)
thx :)

item.title: Couple questions
item.dc:creator: @Play_N_Skillz Play N Skillz
item.description:
@Play_N_Skillz wrote:

Try this…

if (command.startsWith("sara") && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(1048, 1); addItem(2661, 1); addItem(2667, 1); addItem(2585, 1); addItem(2663, 1); addItem(4151, 1); addItem(1052, 1); addItem(1837, 1); addItem(775, 1); }

That should work…

item.title: Couple questions
item.dc:creator: @justlikers justlikers
item.description:
@justlikers wrote:

to edit the bonuses of a item go to Item.java not item.java make sure the “I” is capital and search your item ID and youll see something like this

item = 3140 dragon_chainbody     a series of metal rings 0         0            0             0            0       0       0             0

the 0’s are what the bonus is…if you want str go to the second to last 0…and then fool around and find out what one is attack and what one is deff ect.

oh and for what was just posted above…take out the first } under

if(command.startsWith and the

and then click on the end of the line were it says

playerrights >=  2

and press delete and the empty space will fill in…this is for pimpscape

Read full topic

item.title: Couple questions
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Yeah[br][size=1]Posted on: April 10, 2007, 03:13:43 PM[/size][hr]Now for editing item bonuses… go to your item.cfg, and search for the code of the item you want the bonuses changed.
I will use a whip as an example

item = 4151	Abyssal_whip	A_weapon_from_the_abyss.	651608.0013642381	651608.0013642381	850929.5918252946	0	82	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	82	0

This is what the whip looks like in item.cfg. The first 3 numbers (the ones with the decimal) is the price. The numbers after it is the bonuses.
Ex.

item = 4151	Abyssal_whip	A_weapon_from_the_abyss.	651608.0013642381	651608.0013642381	850929.5918252946	100	100	100	100	100	100	100	100	100	100	100	100

That changed the bonuses of the whip all to 100.

Hope that helps

Read full topic
